hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Serenade of Water# and #a Bottle#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Goron Shop#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Mirror Shield#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Zora Shop#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Fish Bottle#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Mirror Shield#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #5# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Fish Bottle#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Wallet#.
